= Supported Operating Systems. =

For now !AddOn works under:
  * Windows (tested under Windows XP Home/Pro in Polish and English edition).
  * Linux (tested on Ubuntu 7.04 with Java 6)

!AddOn should also works under other systems. 
If somebody tried it under any other OS please inform [http://przemelek.googlepages.com/kontakt me].
 
For work !AddOn needs Sun Java 6, also !OpenOffice must be configured to use Sun Java 6.
